Package org.webcurator.core.harvester.coordinator

Interface Summary
DasCallback Callback interface for the DAS.
HarvestAgentListener The HarvestAgentListener is a service that listens for messages from a HarvestAgent.
HarvestCoordinator The HarvestCoordinator is responsible for managing the scheduling, monitoring and completion of harvests.
IndexerService  
 

Class Summary
BandwidthCalculator The Bandwidth Calculator is a utility class that provides a convienient method for calculating how much bandwidth should be allocated to a list of target instances.
HarvestAgentListenerSOAPService The Server side implmentation of the HarvestAgentListener.
HarvestCoordinatorImpl  
HarvestCoordinatorNotifier The HarvestCoordinatorNotifier uses SOAP to send messages back to the core.
